```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
source('dataSetup.R')
library(leaflet)

```

```{r map1, message=F,error=F,warning=F}

mc<-mdata %>% filter(Parameter=='Cases')
md<-mdata %>% filter(Parameter=='Deaths')

#Make map
  leaflet() %>% 
  addTiles() %>% 
  addCircleMarkers(lat=mc$Lat,lng=mc$Long,radius=sqrt(mc$Result)*.01,
                   weight=.5,fillColor = 'blue',popup = paste0(mc$`Province/State`,"; ",mc$Result," cases")) %>%
  addCircleMarkers(lat=mc$Lat,lng=mc$Long,radius=sqrt(md$Result)*.01,
                   weight=.5,fillColor = 'red',popup = paste0(md$`Province/State`,"; ",md$Result," deaths"))


```
